amendment.description: Amendment adds language to the bill prohibiting the use of funds by the State Department to approve the purchase of property in Arlington, VA by the Xinhua News Agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 77 printed in the Congressional Record to add language to the bill prohibiting the use of funds by the State Department to approve the purchase of property in Arlington, VA by the Xinhua News Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vitter amendment (A043) Agreed to by recorded vote: 367 - 34, 7 Present (Roll no. 325).
